description: Update a client key.  This can be used to rename a key.

parameters.description: the new name for the client key.
parameters.name: name

path_parameters.description: the slug of the organization the client keys belong to.
path_parameters.name: organization_slug

path_parameters.description: the slug of the project the client keys belong to.
path_parameters.name: project_slug

path_parameters.description: the ID of the key to update.
path_parameters.name: key_id

title: Update a Client Key
